Posts.Content: Aug 11, 2010 07:40PM lynn1575 wrote: I had lumpectomy, chemo, rads - finished Jan. 2010. Ist mammo done end of May, had to wait for extra views, then ultrasound. Radiologist came in and said "Well.... I'm going to call it your new normal, but I would recommend a MRI in 6 months. I had a baseline MRI done before the lumpectomy and my existing breast cancer didn't show!Â  I'm really not sure what I'm going to do. I have my 3 month check with my oncologist tomorrow, so I'll discuss it with him.
Posts.Title: MRI after treatment mari65 lynn1575
